New Records: Fakhar Zaman scored a century for Pakistan in 63 balls, the fastest in a World Cup match
Key Match Events: Fakhar Zaman's century powered Pakistan to 200-1 in 25.3 overs, enough to win under the DLS method
Rachin Ravindra scored a century for New Zealand, but Pakistan still managed to win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was rain-affected, with two interruptions
